survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the effectiveness and user satisfaction with collaboration tools used within the workplace to enhance team productivity and communication.

questions.question_text: Which collaboration tools does your team currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for unspecified tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option triggering an open-text field.

script.question_text: Which collaboration tools does your team currently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary collaboration tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced and includes a neutral option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your primary collaboration tool?

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in your collaboration tool?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand which features are most important. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option triggering an open-text field.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in your collaboration tool?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your collaboration tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to assess the frequency of technical issues. Ensure the options are clear and mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your collaboration tool?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your primary collaboration tool?
questions.client_notes: Leave this as an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
